name: Space Invaders by Savarin
description:
Well, hi all, this is my first game using HaxeFlixel and first time uploading a game xD. I'm Studying Game development so ill upload all the Works they give me to do :D

at menu use ->, <- keys to make apper the ship

Space invaders: z - shot

Origins: z - shot

x - supershot

space - skip intro
